# VersaUI Project Boards

## Main Boards

### 1. Development Board
Columns:
- Backlog
- Ready for Development
- In Progress
- Review
- Done

### 2. Feature Tracking
Columns:
- Proposed
- Approved
- In Development
- Testing
- Released

### 3. Documentation
Columns:
- Needs Documentation
- Writing
- Review
- Published
